Summary: flying object low above the tree tops
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving west on M28 at night, just passed the Hulbert turn-off. There is nothing but darkness between Hulbert and Newberry on M28. I saw 2 white lights in the distance on the south side of M28. My initial thought was that they had build a new gas station with one of those huge signs up and I thought it was awesome because there was no where to stop and get gas at night between the "Soo" (Sault Ste. Marie) and Newberry. As I continued driving down the hill after the turn off to Hulbert, I noticed the lights were moving slowing at a diagonal to the road and were coming straight towards me. I realized it was low just above the tree line and huge. I wondered why the other cars didn't notice it that were coming east on M28. I slowed down and it keep gliding towards my car. I tried to wake up my son to witness it but I could not wake him up. He would not waken no matter what I did, shaking him and yelling his name. The object seem to glide, no noise - it came directly over my car and as I looked up at it through the windshield as it crossed over my car - it was so huge, I couldn't see any end of it. I don't know if it was round or oblong but it was unending. I could not see one end or the other. It was black underneath and there was a round cylinder section with sections up the sides. My headlights reflected off the machine - whatever it was. It was just blackness up into that round cylinder part. I just remember saying to myself - begging to it, "please don't take me with you" "I have a son who is sick and I have to get to him". I feared it would take us. It continued to move right over my car and towards the northeast - towards Hulbert. I was so scared, I drove a 100 miles an hour to Newberry to get away from it. I brought my brother and his friends back with me a little later to see if we could see it. It was no where in sight. I never want to see another object like that. It was not from here. A few years later I did see a black triangle object one night going to Rudyard on a back road. It appeared out of the fog and when the object seemed to notice I saw it, it simply vanished in front of my eyes. It was incredible and I wondered what that was. I had a strong feeling that was some stealth govt object at the time and I still do today. The first one was not of this world. It was too huge and too slow and absolutely quiet as it moved.
Object Shape: Blimp, Chevron, Cylinder, Diamond, Triangle, Other
